summary: This document contains a series of financial transactions involving Hyperion Air, LLC, detailing payments made to various entities including the Government of the Virgin Islands and World Fuel Services. The checks are dated from 2014 to 2018 and include amounts for franchise taxes and services rendered.

persons.name: James L. Abbott
persons.context: James L. Abbott is mentioned as a payee in a transaction involving Hyperion Air, LLC.

persons.name: Willis of New York Inc.
persons.context: Willis of New York Inc. is mentioned multiple times as a payee for services rendered.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, 83 St. Thomas, USVI 00802-1348
keyFacts: Hyperion Air, LLC made multiple payments to the Government of the Virgin Islands for franchise taxes.
Payments were made to World Fuel Services for fuel services.
The document includes checks dated from 2014 to 2018, indicating ongoing financial transactions.
